name: Beat Skater
description: Beat Skater is a rhythm lite 3D skateboarding mobile game featuring rogue-lite elements that has the player skateboarding with a variety of intuitive taps and swipes in a set distance track composed of pseudo-random modules. As they continue to skate, players will learn how to perform new tricks, gain new boards to skate on and unlock new track pieces all while working toward completing challenges and earning cosmetics.
